content:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Solutions Architect role at Amazon. My background in electrical engineering and over 7-10 years of experience in senior technical leader positions within the Energy and Utilities industry make me an ideal fit for this role.

My technical skills include:

* Strong foundation in enterprise IT, including:
	+ Database systems
	+ Tiered storage architectures
	+ Virtualization (server and desktop)
	+ Data center operations
	+ Network security
* Deep understanding of the Energy and Utilities industry, including relevant applications, platforms, and data ecosystems
* Togo certification and experience in process and robotic automation

I also have strong leadership and communication skills, and have a proven track record of managing and leading teams. I have the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations, including with customers, SI’s, and ISVs. I have a strong track record of building, sponsoring, and influencing executive investment in new systems based on data-driven business cases, and have relied on big data analytics to uncover and size the value of technology investments.

I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and experience to Amazon and contribute to the success of your team. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
